duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop business goals and action plan to promote profitable growth.
Lead and develop a high-performance environment.
Drive accountability for improvement and positive change based upon business objectives.
Coordinate with the Director of Operations on resolving any inspection issues.
Maintain positive customer relationships with parents, schools, and departments.
Develop a recruiting plan to hire and retain experienced drivers.
Ensure line of business comply with HR requirements (EEOC, Affirmative Action and other employment rules and regulations).
Identify, hire, mentor, and develop associates within line of business.
Ensure DOT and OSHA compliance for all locations within the area of operational responsibility.
Planning, organizing, assigning, scheduling, and directing the work of others.
Encourage professional driver appearance and behavior.
Perform other tasks as assigned by leadership.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business or Transportation and/or 5 years of experience in the transportation industry.
